1.14.2.1.14.3-1.17.2.0: Implemented an invisible player model fix.

1.13.2.1.13.2-1.17.2.0: Implemented an invisible player model fix.
1.13.2.1.13.2-1.16.2.1: The "TickNextTick out of synch" fix attempt is now disabled
1.13.2.1.13.2-1.16.2.0: Attempted a fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.13.2.1.13.2-1.16.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.
Implemented particle fixes.
Increased the packet size limit.
Implemented a dismount keybind which is separate from the sneak keybind.

1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.2.0:
Implemented an invisible player model fix.
Fixed /rpreload and /rpreloadclient.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.1.0:
The packet size limit patch no longer loads when LittleTiles is installed.
Hopefully fixed the window icons not working on Mac OS X.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.0.0:
Optimized the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException fix and made it enabled by default.
Backported the smooth eye level change animation from Minecraft 1.13 and newer.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.3.1: The packet size limit patch no longer loads when SpongeForge is installed.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.3.0: Attempted another fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.2.1:
Fixed the End portal tweaks.
The "TickNextTick out of synch" fix attempt is now disabled by default.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.2.0:
Improved the window icon configuration options.
Attempted a fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.
Removed the Teleporter replacement patch.
Implemented particle fixes.
Added a configuration option to change the packet size limit.
Implemented a dismount keybind which is separate from the sneak keybind. It is disabled by default.
Configuration options no longer exist on versions of Minecraft they have no effect on.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.15.1.0:
The potion glowing effect is now toggleable in-game.
Custom window icons are now loaded earlier.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility again.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.3:
Fixed the faster language switching patch.
Changed the End portal and End gateway break particle textures to obsidian to match Minecraft 1.13+.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.2: Fixed a ClassCastException related to the skull stacking fix.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.0:
Switched to RandomLib for configuration handling, which means the configuration GUI now works on all supported versions of Minecraft.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility.
Fixed localizations on older versions of Minecraft.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.1.1: Improved the implementation of the skull stacking fix, potentially fixing a ConcurrentModificationException.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.1.0:
Fixed a ConcurrentModificationException related to the skull stacking fix.
Filled buckets can now replace Nether portals by default.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.0.0:
Fixed issues related to the skull stacking fix.
The boat buoyancy patch now only affects boats that are under flowing water.
Implemented a fix for MC-11944.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.13.0.1: Fixed a server crash introduced in 1.12.2-1.13.0.1.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.13.0.0:
Implemented the skull stacking fix.
Fixed 1.11 compatibility.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.12.0.2: RandomPatches now also fixes End Gateway break particle textures.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.12.0.0: Moved the Teleporter and portal renderer replacements back from RandomPatches Integration.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.11.0.2: Fixed compatibility with the Golden Lasso from Extra Utilities 2 and similar items by storing entities' bounding boxes as relative instead of absolute.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.10.0.0:
Removed RandomPortals support.
Fixed a typo in the configuration.
Code cleanup and refactor.

Refactor.

1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.

1.10.2.1.12.2-1.17.2.0:
Implemented an invisible player model fix.
Fixed /rpreload and /rpreloadclient.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.17.1.0:
The packet size limit patch no longer loads when LittleTiles is installed.
Hopefully fixed the window icons not working on Mac OS X.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.17.0.0:
Optimized the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException fix and made it enabled by default.
Backported the smooth eye level change animation from Minecraft 1.13 and newer.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.16.3.1: The packet size limit patch no longer loads when SpongeForge is installed.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.16.3.0: Attempted another fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.

1.10.2.1.12.2-1.16.2.0:
Improved the window icon configuration options.
Attempted a fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.16.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.
Removed the Teleporter replacement patch.
Implemented particle fixes.
Added a configuration option to change the packet size limit.
Implemented a dismount keybind which is separate from the sneak keybind. It is disabled by default.
Configuration options no longer exist on versions of Minecraft they have no effect on.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.15.1.0:
The potion glowing effect is now toggleable in-game.
Custom window icons are now loaded earlier.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility again.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.3:
Fixed the faster language switching patch.
Changed the End portal and End gateway break particle textures to obsidian to match Minecraft 1.13+.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.2: Fixed a ClassCastException related to the skull stacking fix.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.0:
Switched to RandomLib for configuration handling, which means the configuration GUI now works on all supported versions of Minecraft.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility.
Fixed localizations on older versions of Minecraft.

1.10.2.1.12.2-1.14.1.0:
Fixed a ConcurrentModificationException related to the skull stacking fix.
Filled buckets can now replace Nether portals by default.
1.10.2.1.12.2-1.14.0.0:
Fixed issues related to the skull stacking fix.
The boat buoyancy patch now only affects boats that are under flowing water.

1.8.8.1.12.2-1.17.1.0:
The packet size limit patch no longer loads when LittleTiles is installed.
Hopefully fixed the window icons not working on Mac OS X.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.17.0.0:
Optimized the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException fix and made it enabled by default.
Backported the smooth eye level change animation from Minecraft 1.13 and newer.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.16.3.1: The packet size limit patch no longer loads when SpongeForge is installed.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.16.3.0: Attempted another fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.16.2.1:
Fixed the End portal tweaks.
The "TickNextTick out of synch" fix attempt is now disabled by default.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.16.2.0:
Improved the window icon configuration options.
Attempted a fix for the "TickNextTick out of synch" IllegalStateException.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.16.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.
Removed the Teleporter replacement patch.
Implemented particle fixes.
Added a configuration option to change the packet size limit.
Implemented a dismount keybind which is separate from the sneak keybind. It is disabled by default.
Configuration options no longer exist on versions of Minecraft they have no effect on.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.15.1.0:
The potion glowing effect is now toggleable in-game.
Custom window icons are now loaded earlier.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility again.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.15.0.3:
Fixed the faster language switching patch.
Changed the End portal and End gateway break particle textures to obsidian to match Minecraft 1.13+.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.15.0.2: Fixed a ClassCastException related to the skull stacking fix.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.15.0.0:
Switched to RandomLib for configuration handling, which means the configuration GUI now works on all supported versions of Minecraft.
Fixed 1.8 compatibility.
Fixed localizations on older versions of Minecraft.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.14.1.1: Improved the implementation of the skull stacking fix, potentially fixing a ConcurrentModificationException.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.14.1.0:
Fixed a ConcurrentModificationException related to the skull stacking fix.
Filled buckets can now replace Nether portals by default.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.14.0.0:
Fixed issues related to the skull stacking fix.
The boat buoyancy patch now only affects boats that are under flowing water.
Implemented a fix for MC-11944.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.13.0.1: Fixed a server crash introduced in 1.12.2-1.13.0.1.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.13.0.0:
Implemented the skull stacking fix.
Fixed 1.11 compatibility.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.12.0.2: RandomPatches now also fixes End Gateway break particle textures.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.12.0.0: Moved the Teleporter and portal renderer replacements back from RandomPatches Integration.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.11.0.2: Fixed compatibility with the Golden Lasso from Extra Utilities 2 and similar items by storing entities' bounding boxes as relative instead of absolute.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.10.0.0:
Removed RandomPortals support.
Fixed a typo in the configuration.
Code cleanup and refactor.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.9.0.0:
Refactor.
Implemented a fix for MC-2025.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.8.0.0:
Fixed 1.8+ compatibility.
Implemented a fix for MC-129057.
Added boat tweaks.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.6.1.2:
Minor tweaks to configuration property comments.
Improved an error message.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.6.1.1: An error message is now logged if an invalid fingerprint is detected.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.6.0.0:
Cleaned up the code.
Added an option to disable potion glints.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.5.0.3: Fixed a NullPointerException related to the Toggle Narrator keybind.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.5.0.2: Potentially fixed a crash with AppleCore.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.5.0.0:
Fixed an issue regarding configuration reloading.
Added configuration options to force disable the transformation of specific classes.
Added options to configure the window title and icon.
1.8.8.1.12.2-1.4.1.1: Fixed a crash with Rebind Narrator.
